alert.note: Alert for Greater Lake Tahoe Area; Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 6:52PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...Areas of Blowing Dust possible in the Greater Reno-Sparks area... At 648 PM PDT, Doppler radar was an area of blowing dust moving west at 15 mph along I-80. This could reduce visibilities down to 2 to 5 miles. Gusts could approach 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, sudden reductions of visibility from blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Reno, Virginia City, Sparks, Dayton, Lockwood, Wingfield Springs, Northwest Reno, Spanish Springs, Lemmon Valley-Golden Valley, Golden Valley, Caughlin Ranch, Hidden Valley, Stead, Damonte Ranch, Pleasant Valley, Lemmon Valley, Fort Churchill Station, Reno-Tahoe International Airport, Stagecoach and NWS Reno. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Greater Lake Tahoe Area; Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
